text: KPA may refer to: * Keele Postgraduate Association, Keele University, UK, formerly Keele Research Association (KRA) * Kenya Ports Authority * Kiln phosphoric acid, a dry process to produce phosphoric acid at high temperature in a kiln * Kilopascal (kPa), a unit of pressure * Known-plaintext attack, a method of cryptanalysis * Korean People's Army, the armed forces of North Korea * Aruba Police Force (Dutch: Korps Politie Aruba) * Kosovo Property Agency
title: KPA
